channel.title: Comments on: MyAccess for room reservations and classes

item.title: By: Michele Mizejewski
item.dc:creator: Michele Mizejewski
item.description: Kirk, you can go to https://www.library.ucsf.edu/services/spaces and click Faculty Carrels. That brings you to https://www.library.ucsf.edu/services/spaces/carrels where daily carrels can be reserved. Monthly still have to be done in person, because there is no way to fit that model into the reservation system.
item.content:encoded: Kirk, you can go to https://www.library.ucsf.edu/services/spaces and click Faculty Carrels. That brings you to https://www.library.ucsf.edu/services/spaces/carrels where daily carrels can be reserved. Monthly still have to be done in person, because there is no way to fit that model into the reservation system.

item.title: By: Kirk Hudson
item.dc:creator: Kirk Hudson
item.description: @sf213198 Michele Mizejewshi REALLY, faculty carrels are now reserved online using LibCal? Wow, this is a nice step forward for this service, but I do not see the option in the "Study Spaces" drop down menu to reserve faculty carrels, nor do I see any calendar for faculty carrels. Where can I find out more about online faculty carrel reservations?
item.content:encoded: @sf213198 Michele Mizejewshi REALLY, faculty carrels are now reserved online using LibCal? Wow, this is a nice step forward for this service, but I do not see the option in the “Study Spaces” drop down menu to reserve faculty carrels, nor do I see any calendar for faculty carrels. Where can I find out more about online faculty carrel reservations?

item.title: By: Ariel Deardorff
item.dc:creator: Ariel Deardorff
item.description: This is great! Thanks for letting us know Michele!
item.content:encoded: This is great! Thanks for letting us know Michele!
